title: European Passenger Cars CO2 Analysis
description: A comprehensive data science project analyzing and predicting CO₂ emissions from European passenger cars using machine learning techniques and interactive visualizations. Built with Python, Scikit-learn, and Streamlit.
highlights: Random Forest model for CO₂ emission predictions

title: Neural Evolution Ecosystem Simulation
description: A real-time evolutionary simulation where creatures with neural network brains evolve through natural selection, mutation, and survival in a dynamic ecosystem. Features NEAT-inspired evolution and complex predator-prey dynamics.
highlights: Dynamic neural networks controlling creature behavior

title: Sentiment Analysis on Amazon Reviews
description: Machine learning project for classifying Amazon product reviews as positive or negative. Trained multiple models including Logistic Regression, SVM, and Neural Networks, achieving 92% accuracy.
